title: Woman on the Run (restored, colorized, with intro and outro) (1950, film noir, imdb score: 7.2)

sources.title: Woman on the Run (restored, colorized, with intro and outro) (1950, film noir, imdb score: 7.2)
sources.description: Woman on the Run is a 1950 American crime film noir directed by Norman Foster and starring Ann Sheridan and Dennis O'Keefe . The film was based on the April 1948 short story "Man on the Run" by Sylvia Tate. The film exists in the public domain and was restored and preserved by the UCLA Film and Television Archive .
